data.title: What is a Grundig Majestic model?
data.meta_description:
Grundig Majestic International is a (Formerly West) German
manufacturer of fine Radios, Record players, etc.. they date back
to the end of WW2 in Werke, Germany.
data.text:
Grundig Majestic International is a (Formerly West) German manufacturer of fine Radios, Record players, etc.. they date back to the end of WW2 in Werke, Germany.

What is the value of a grundig-majestic 2077?

If fully restored and in good cosmetic condition, should go between $400-650 Deduct at least 50% if cabinet has issues. If unrestored with good cabinet worth $35-75. They are difficult and expensive to restore

Where can one purchase Grundig portable Radios?

You can purchase Grundig portable radios from retailers such as Amazon. Once on the page, type "Grundig Portable Radio" into the search field at the top of the page and press enter to bring up the items.
